name: Yarua
Lore: 'Kashyyyk''s senior Wookiee senator. Believes that a thorough taxation plan will assist funding of other worthwhile Republic programs. Despises the corruption around him.',
Text: 'Agendas: justice, taxation. While in a senate majority, retrieve 1 Force when you initiate a Force drain at a battleground system. Once per turn, may use 1 Force to target a senator present with a wealth agenda. Target is politics -2 this turn.',
